articles.description: Now that the lottery is over, the 2022  NBA  draft order is set. Certain prospects will start getting tied to specific teams based on projections throughout the year and roster needs...
articles.content:
John Minchillo/Associated Press
More obvious targets: Jaden Ivey, Shaedon Sharpe, Keegan Murray
For most of the year, Jaden Ivey has been perceived as the next-best prospect behind Jabari Smith, Ch… [+1425 chars]

articles.title: Steph Curry's priceless plea to Bob Myers after Gary Payton II pestered him - NBC Sports
articles.description: Steph Curry did not want to see Gary Payton II on any opposing team after facing off against him in practice during the preseason.
articles.content:
Opposing defenders usually are the ones trying to avoid getting burned by Steph Curry, not the other way around.
